name: BailBot
0:
”Alexa, open Bail Bot”
”I need an excuse to stay home”
”Thanks, bail bot”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bail bot
des:
Need some me time? Bail Bot helps you find the excuses so you can stay home and go out next time. Our never-ending* supply of excuses will help you find that me time in-amongst all the other things you have going on.

* Excuses have to end sometimes
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
